title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When two projects (P1 and P2) are selected, the Open/Close project functionality should be available for both projects.
EB: Currently, the Open/Close project functionality is not always available for both projects. In some cases, it is enabled for one project and disabled for the other.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 2. Select P2 and close it.
